Structs/DIRegion.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRegio.name: countrySubclass
Structs/DIRegion.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRegio.abstract: A set of ids that identify a specific subclass of the country, might be null. If more than one, subclasses should be inserted from the most to the least encompassing

Protocols/DIPermission.html#/s:6Drivit12.name: resolve(view:)
Protocols/DIPermission.html#/s:6Drivit12.abstract: Performs the required action when a setting is not correctly configured.

Protocols/DIEvent.html#/s:6Drivit7DIEven.name: type
Protocols/DIEvent.html#/s:6Drivit7DIEven.abstract: An internal identifier that is used to fetch the corresponding database object.

Protocols/DIAuthentication.html#/s:6Driv.abstract: Control to validate if the user is logged in

Protocols/DIAuthentication.html#/s:6Driv.abstract: Allows you to delete your data from our servers

Protocols/DIPermission.html.name: DIPermission
Protocols/DIPermission.html.abstract: Setting class that represents a specific system permission

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: didStartTripNotification
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: This event will happen when the SDK starts a new trip.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: didFinishTripNotification
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: This event will happen when the SDK finish a trip.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: didRestartTripNotification
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: This event is called when the recording of a trip restarts after having been finished in the past.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: didChangeTripNotification
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: This event will happen when the SDK updates the running trip info.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: didUpdateReportNotification
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: This event will happen when the SDK is notified about the trip consumption.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: didChangeTripsWaitingForSyncNotification
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: This event will happen when the number of trips waiting to be synced potentially changes.

Enums/DIResult.html#/s:6Drivit8DIResultO.name: success(_:)
Enums/DIResult.html#/s:6Drivit8DIResultO.abstract: The success indicates the success of an operation and can return an object of an type ‘T’

Enums/DIResult.html#/s:6Drivit8DIResultO.name: error(_:)
Enums/DIResult.html#/s:6Drivit8DIResultO.abstract: The error represents that there was an error in the operation and always returns an error object.

Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.name: rejectedByUser2InCarButNotDriving
Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.abstract: The recorded trip does not belong to the user: user was a passenger, e.g Taxi

Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.name: rejectedByUser2PublicTransport
Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.abstract: The recorded trip does not belong to the user, it was public transport

Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.name: rejectedByUser2BikeWalkStill
Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.abstract: The recorded trip does not belong to the user: user was cycling, walking or still

Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.name: rejectedByUserOther
Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.abstract: The recorded trip does not belong to the user: other reason

Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.name: rejectedByUserNoReason
Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.abstract: The recorded trip does not belong to the user: no reason was given by the user

Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.name: rejectedStillTrip
Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.abstract: The recorded trip does not belong to the user: ignore it

Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.name: acceptedByUser
Enums/TripValidity.html#/s:6Drivit12Trip.abstract: Trip has been confirmed and accepted by the user

Enums/DIError/Authentication.html#/s:6Dr.abstract: User is trying to create an account with an invalid region

Enums/DIError/Authentication.html#/s:6Dr.abstract: Error constant: The user is trying to login or signup with an account scheduled for deletion that will be removed within 48 hours

Enums/DIResult.html.name: DIResult
Enums/DIResult.html.abstract: Result of the operation that was running. This result is normally used in callbacks.

Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.name: numberHarshEvents
Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.abstract: Returns the time the user interacted with the device, in sec

Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.abstract: Whether the SDK is still waiting for consumption data to arrive from Drivit servers or not

Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.name: fuelConsumption()
Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.abstract: Returns the fuel consumption of the trip, in l/100km. This method may return one of three cases:

Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.name: rejectedReason(mergeWithServer:)
Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.abstract: Returns the rejected reason or, in other words, the validity state of this trip. The default value

Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.name: hasFilesToSync()
Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.abstract: This method will say if there is any files needed to upload with the metadata of this trip.

Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.name: hasAutomaticClassification()
Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.abstract: Method to determine whether the trip has been processed by the Drivit server and has its automatic

Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.name: sync(completion:)
Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.abstract: Force the sync of the files that still need to be uploaded to the server, if the trip has no files to be synced this method will not do anything.

Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.name: sync(includeScoringData:completion:)
Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.abstract: Force the sync of the files that still need to be uploaded to the server, if the trip has no files to be synced this method will not do anything.

Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.name: areLocationsAndEventsAvailable()
Protocols/DITrip.html#/s:6Drivit6DITripP.abstract: Validates if the SDK has to download remote locations

Protocols/DIChargingEvent.html#/s:6Drivi.name: tripGuid
Protocols/DIChargingEvent.html#/s:6Drivi.abstract: The guid of the trip, if any

Protocols/DIChargingEvent.html#/s:6Drivi.name: initialBatteryLevel
Protocols/DIChargingEvent.html#/s:6Drivi.abstract: The battery level when the charging began, in %

Protocols/DIChargingEvent.html#/s:6Drivi.abstract: The timestamp of when the charging event began. In forced charging events, the timestamp will always be equal to the timestamp of the beggining of the trip

Protocols/DIChargingEvent.html#/s:6Drivi.name: tsEnd
Protocols/DIChargingEvent.html#/s:6Drivi.abstract: The timestamp of when the charging event ended. For the time being, charging events are instantaneous, which means tsEnd=tsStart

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The total number of trips of the user

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: distance_total
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The total distance travelled, in km

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: tripCount_withForcedCharging
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: Number of trips where forced charging (PUBLIC_SPACES) happened

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: tripCountWithNormalCharging
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: Number of trips where normal charging (PUBLIC_SPACES) happened

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: reportTimePeriod
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The time horizon of this report, in days

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: Energy expenses of the base vehicle, in €

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: energyExpenses_targetVehicle
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: Energy expenses of the target vehicle, in €

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: chargingEventsCount_private
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The number of charging events in private places

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: chargingEventsCount_public
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The number of charging events in public places (forced charging)

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: chargingEventsCount_privateOptimistic
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The number of private charging events in the case that the vehicle is only charged when the battery reaches zero

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The total duration of charging events in public places, in minutes, considering fast charging

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: chargingEventsDuration_public_ifSlowCharging
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The total duration of charging events in public places, in minutes, considering slow charging

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: totalCo2_baseVehicle
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: Total CO2 emissions of the base vehicle, in Kg

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: totalCo2_targetVehicle
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: Total CO2 emissions of the target vehicle, in Kg

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: equivalentNumberOfTrees_baseVehicle
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The number of trees required to absorb the CO2 emitted by the base vehicle

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The number of trees required to absorb the CO2 emitted by the target vehicle

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: Average battery consumed per trip, in %

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The average battery level when it is charged in private places, in %

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The average battery level when it is charged in public places, in %

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: chargingEventsDuration_private
Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.abstract: The total duration of charging events in private places, in minutes

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: currentBatteryLevel

Protocols/DIReport.html#/s:6Drivit8DIRep.name: averageBatteryLevel

Classes/Drivit/default.html#/s:6DrivitAA.name: register(withOptions:)

Classes/Drivit/default.html#/s:6DrivitAA.name: didReceiveRemoteNotification(userInfo:)
Classes/Drivit/default.html#/s:6DrivitAA.abstract: It’s called only when your app is running in the foreground to handle the notification.

Classes/Drivit/default.html#/s:6DrivitAA.abstract: Tells the SDK that a remote notification arrived that indicates there is data to be fetched.

Classes/Drivit/default.html#/s:6DrivitAA.abstract: Tells the SDK that a background fetch has arrived.

Classes/Drivit/user.html#/s:6DrivitAAC4u.abstract: Sets the target vehicle against which the base vehicle will be compared

Classes/Drivit/user.html#/s:6DrivitAAC4u.name: targetVehicle()
Classes/Drivit/user.html#/s:6DrivitAAC4u.abstract: Returns the current target vehicle associated with the user

Classes/Drivit/user.html#/s:6DrivitAAC4u.name: checkIfUserHasTripsOrAccelToSync()
Classes/Drivit/user.html#/s:6DrivitAAC4u.abstract: Whether the SDK has any relevant trip information waiting to be synced

Classes/Drivit/user.html#/s:6DrivitAAC4u.abstract: Call this method to get the trip that is running at the moment.

Classes/Drivit/user.html#/s:6DrivitAAC4u.name: isRecordingTrip()
Classes/Drivit/user.html#/s:6DrivitAAC4u.abstract: To check if there is a running trip

Classes/Drivit/user.html#/s:6DrivitAAC4u.name: generateReport(completion:)
Classes/Drivit/user.html#/s:6DrivitAAC4u.abstract: Generate that holds the summary of several trip metrics, including total distances, costs and CO2 emissions. All metrics exclude the trips that are rejected, soft-deleted or not fully processed yet

Classes/Drivit/settings.html#/s:6DrivitA.abstract: Utility method to open the application screen.

Classes/Drivit/cloud.html#/s:6DrivitAAC5.name: parseTecdoc(xml:completion:)
Classes/Drivit/cloud.html#/s:6DrivitAAC5.abstract: Converts a given XML into a vehicle

Classes/Drivit/cloud.html#/s:6DrivitAAC5.name: syncAccelAndTrips(includeScoringData:completion:)
Classes/Drivit/cloud.html#/s:6DrivitAAC5.abstract: Force-syncs all trip-related info, even if the user is not on wifi. Take care with this method as it can consume a large amount of mobile data.

Classes/Drivit/cloud.html#/s:6DrivitAAC5.name: send(feedback:)
